attributes.action: make the subject of History a compulsory subject in GCSE in order to help promote Britishness
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are many schemes afoot in Education to promote Britishness, yet the subject of History is declining since it became optional.  By making it compulsory we can help to promote Britishness and a sense of national identity without the need to create all manner of new curriculum subjects.
